definitions.definition: To relegate (something, especially a topic or a group of people) to the margins or to a lower limit ; to exclude socially or otherwise.
To find a marginal distribution of a joint probability distribution .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To relegate (something, especially a topic or a group of people) to the margins or to a lower limit ; to exclude socially or otherwise.
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) To find a marginal distribution of a joint probability distribution .
